item.title: Dinosaurs
item.description: Ever since I was a kid I always liked Dinosaurs, well I guess most kids do! As an adult I just really like the idea behind dinosaurs â€” this ancient creatures that are long gone and we have this space to speculate and imagine how they looked and behaved!

item.title: Manga
item.description: I don't read comics often but there are so many absolute gems in japanese comic medium. It seems that comic artists have so much freedom in expressing their ideas and while western comics are all about supernatural, manga often covers a lot of niche subjects like mundane tasks like cooking or historic dramas.
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Matcha Tea
item.description: I adore the taste of this tea and even more so I really appreciate the traditional preparation process. It's really relaxing ceremony!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Outrun
item.description: I love 80s Neon aesthetic and deep synthetic sounds. I already mentioned that I like Vaporwave and while similar outrun is a different take. While Vaporwave is often mellow and nostalgic, outrun feels opposite of the same coin: active and nostalgic.
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Photography
item.description: Photography is a fun, accessible and pragmatic art medium. New phones come with brilliant cameras and it's so easy to always be ready for some cool shots - and there are so many!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Zdislav Beksinski
item.description: A brilliant artist that is often considered to be the father for horror surrealism!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Sauna
item.description: I used to heavily dislike Sauna but over time it kinda grew on me. Major enjoyment that I discovered is actually my new enjoyment in stressing my body - it weirdly feels rejuvenating!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Geese
item.description: Gease are probably my favorite birds. They are adorable, weird and tough!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Rats
item.description: Rats are absolutely adorable, smart and such fun creatures! I used to have 3 rats and were some of the best friends I've had!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Coffee
item.description: I used to dislike coffee but since I moved to Thailand I'm having it almost every day! Turns out it's such a varied drink that is part of an enjoyable preparation ritual.
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Lofi Hip-Hop
item.description: Lofi hip-hop has really been my core background music for a while now. It's relaxing and not introsive which helps me to focus on my work. Weirdly enough it also helps me feel less lonely - same effect as how people often run TV in the background.
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Tea
item.description: Herbal, green, black or red - there are just so many plants that taste great when splashed with boiling water!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Economy
item.description: I find economy's role in our society fascinating. Majority of our lives are influenced by economic designs and decisions and yet it's not that apparent.
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Philosophy
item.description: Philosophy is one of my favorite subjects to study. In general I find thinking awfully addicting to the point and the questions raised in this subjects just feeds of this weakness of mine!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Succulents
item.description: Succulents are super practical and just captivating plants. They feel alien, unique and captivating while only requiring minor care - by far my favorite plants to own!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Thailand
item.description: I've been living in Chiang Mai, Thailand for 2 years now - needless to say I love this place! It has it's faults but it has been my favorite place to stay so far!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Watercolor
item.description: My favorite drawing/painting medium. Watercolor is so practical and it has this hazy psychedelic feeling as if you're drawing with clouds
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Chicken
item.description: Chicken are adorable and quite interesting! I ever have a house with a big yard I'd like to keep few.
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Doom Metal
item.description: By far the heaviest sort of music you can produce. I find the gloomy sound so captivating and psychedelic.
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Harmonica
item.description: Such a practical instrument! I really enjoy the bluesy sound it produces and I got introduced by it by Cowboy Bebop animated show that featured one of the best players in the world - Wheeping Harp!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Horror Books
item.description: I love scary books! Be it fairy tales, lovecraftian stories or mystery detective thrillers - the spooky supernatural is awesome!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Japan
item.description: I find volcanic islands just beautiful - combine that with the charming japanese culture and you have such a pleasant environment!
item.dc:creator: Bernard

item.title: Origami
item.description: Origami is such a practical art expression - all you need is a piece of paper and you can make an object out of it: how cool is that?

item.title: Shrimp
item.description: Domestic Neocardina shrimp are just adorable!
